flawed_nl_solution:
If a bunny comes out of its hole three times in a minute, in an hour, with 60 minutes, the bunny will come out of the hole 60*3=<<60*3=180>>180 times.
In 10 hours, a bunny will come out of their hole 180*10=<<180*10=1080>>1080 times.
The combined time that 20 bunnies coming out of their holes will have taken in 10 hours is 1080*20=<<1080*20=21600>>21600 times.
#### 21600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 1080. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
